channel.title: Little Coding Help
channel.description:
okay well what i need so help with is...
once you log into my server the grim reapers face will pop up, i know theres an interface for it but idk id, and as your logged in like theres a npc dialouge that talks to you like umm...
once you log in it will have grim repears face, and on the chat box the name would be Jigsaw / I wanna play a little game.
(click here to continue)
Jigsaw / the rules are simple blah blah blah.
(click here to continue)
jigsaw / make your choice.
and then bam .
yeah...
++ if helped

item.title: Little Coding Help
item.dc:creator: @Legendzdude Legendzdude
item.description:
@Legendzdude wrote:

Ok First search for :

if (playerRights >= 0) {

Then, There will probably have something like :

grimreaper();

delete this and compile

Give Rep++

Read full topic
